name: Spiky
storyline:
While an old witch was quietly spending her evening playing with her friend the booger, her neighbor decided to play a prank on her and put a curse on the poor and innocent booger. The booger finds itself detached from its old friend, transformed into a spiky booger and taken to a cursed dimension! 
This is how Spiky the booger's adventure begins, and it needs your help! Will you be able to help Spiky through some tough challenges to succeed in lifting the curse?
summary:
Spiky is a "lose and try again" type of game, you will have to create a path for Spiky, through obstacles, using items available in your inventory. 
16 levels + 1 final level are available. (Levels are getting bigger and harder).
